contentrichtext.text: {{infobox book | <!-- See [[Wikipedia:WikiProject Novels]] or [[Wikipedia:WikiProject Books]] --> | name = Out of the Dark | title_orig = | translator = | image = [[Image:Out of the dark.jpg|200px]]<!--prefer 1st edition--> | caption = Cover art for ''Out of the Dark''. | author = [[Welwyn Wilton Katz]] | illustrator = | cover_artist = | country = [[Canada]] | language = [[English language|English]] | series = | genre = [[Fantasy novel]] | publisher = | release_date = 1995 | english_release_date = | media_type = [[Paperback]] | pages = | isbn = | preceded_by = | followed_by = }} '''''Out of the Dark''''' (1995) is a [[children's novel]] by [[Canada|Canadian]] [[author]] [[Welwyn Wilton Katz]]. It centres on a young boy who had recently lost his mother, and who has just moved with his remaining family to a small village near [[L'Anse aux Meadows]] in [[Newfoundland (island)|Newfoundland]]. The book deals with his attempts to come to grips with his mother's death, his difficulty settling into his new home, his escapist fantasies about the long-ago Viking settlers of the area, and how these three strands interact. The novel was nominated for a [[1995 Governor General's Awards|Governor General's Award]]. [[Category:Canadian fantasy novels]] [[Category:1995 novels]] [[Category:Novels set in Newfoundland and Labrador]] {{1990s-fantasy-novel-stub}}
